priorVersion.title: CDISC SEND Microscopic Findings Test Name Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C89973

self.title: CDISC SEND Microscopic Findings Test Name Terminology

definition: Terminology for the test names concerned with the findings from a specimen that are visible by microscopic analysis.
name: Microscopic Findings Test Name
preferredTerm: CDISC SEND Microscopic Findings Test Name Terminology

terms.definition: The histopathological evaluation of the liver based on the Batts-Ludwig scoring system.
The histopathological evaluation of the liver based on the Ishak scoring system.
The histopathological evaluation of the liver based on the Knodell scoring system.
The histopathological evaluation of the liver based on the Meta-analysis of Histological Data in Viral Hepatitis (Metavir) scoring system.
An assessment by microscope (e.g., light, electron, confocal, etc.).
The histopathological evaluation of the liver based on the Scheuer scoring system.
